buildup.text: Economics exists because resources are limited but human wants are unlimited.

discovery.text: Every choice has a cost. Spending money on one thing means not spending it on another.

climax.text: Scarcity forces trade-offs. Understanding this is the foundation of all economic thinking.

punchline.text: Economics starts where unlimited wants meet limited resources.

quiz.question: Why does scarcity exist?
